mapper.select: select nvl(max(code1), 'not') as code1 from make_code where code1 like to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') || (select license_number from store where license_number = #{license_number}) || '%'
mapper.insert: insert into make_code values((select to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') from dual) || (select license_number from store where license_number = #{license_number}), '000')

insert into number_ticket (ticket_code, wait_number, the_number, license_number, member_id, ticket_status) values( (select (code1 || code2) + 1 as code from make_code where code1 like to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') || (select license_number from store where license_number = #{license_number})), 1, #{the_number}, #{license_number}, #{member_id}, 0)

insert into number_ticket (ticket_code, wait_number, the_number, license_number, member_id, ticket_status) values( (select (ticket_code + 1) as ticket_code from (select ticket_code from number_ticket where ticket_code like to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') || (select license_number from store where license_number = #{license_number}) || '%' order by ticket_code desc) where rownum <= 1), (select (wait_number+1) as wait_number from (select wait_number from number_ticket where ticket_code like to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') || (select license_number from store where license_number = #{license_number}) || '%' order by wait_number desc) where rownum <= 1), #{the_number}, #{license_number}, #{member_id}, 0)
mapper.update: update number_ticket set wait_number = case when wait_number = -1 then 0 when ticket_status = 0 then (wait_number-1) when ticket_status = 1 then wait_number when ticket_status = 2 then 0 when ticket_status = 3 then 0 else wait_number end, ticket_status = case when wait_number = 0 then (ticket_status+1) else ticket_status end where ticket_code like to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') || (select license_number from store where license_number = #{license_number}) || '%'

update number_ticket set ticket_status = 2 where ticket_code like to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') || (select license_number from store where license_number = #{license_number}) || '%' and member_id = #{member_id}

update number_ticket set ticket_status = 3 where ticket_code like to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') || (select license_number from store where license_number = #{license_number}) || '%' and member_id = #{member_id}

update number_ticket set wait_number = case when wait_number = -1 then 0 when ticket_status = 0 then (wait_number-1) when ticket_status = 1 then wait_number when ticket_status = 2 then 0 when ticket_status = 3 then 0 else wait_number end where ticket_code in (select ticket_code from number_ticket where to_number(ticket_code) >= (select to_number(ticket_code) from number_ticket where ticket_code like to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') || (select license_number from store where license_number = #{license_number}) || '%' and member_id = #{member_id}) and ticket_code like to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') || (select license_number from store where license_number = #{license_number}) || '%')
mapper.select: select case when ticket_status = 0 then '대기' end as wait, count(ticket_status) as status_total from number_ticket where license_number = #{license_number} and ticket_status = 0 and ticket_code like to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') || '%' group by ticket_status

select case when ticket_status = 1 then '발급완료' end as success, count(ticket_status) as status_total from number_ticket where license_number = #{license_number} and ticket_status = 1 and ticket_code like to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') || '%' group by ticket_status

select case when ticket_status = 2 then '발급취소' end as cancel, count(ticket_status) as status_total from number_ticket where license_number = #{license_number} and ticket_status = 2 and ticket_code like to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') || '%' group by ticket_status

select case when ticket_status = 3 then '부재' end as absence, count(ticket_status) as status_total from number_ticket where license_number = #{license_number} and ticket_status = 3 and ticket_code like to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') || '%' group by ticket_status

select substr(ticket_code,19) as ticket_code, wait_number, the_number, license_number, member_id, ticket_status number_ticket from number_ticket where license_number = #{license_number} and ticket_code like to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') || '%' order by ticket_code

select substr(ticket_reg,9,3) as ticket_reg, sum(the_number) as the_number, count(ticket_code) as team from number_ticket where ticket_reg like sysdate-1 || '%' and ticket_status = 1 group by substr(ticket_reg,9,3) order by ticket_reg
select to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as today from dual
select to_char(to_date(#{today},'yyyy/mm/dd')-1, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as today from dual
select to_char(to_date(#{today},'yyyy/mm/dd')+1, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as today from dual

with chart as ( select substr(ticket_reg,9,3) as ticket_reg, sum(the_number) as the_number, count(ticket_code) as team from number_ticket where license_number = '1597530000' and ticket_reg like to_char(to_date(#{today}, 'yy/mm/dd')+1, 'yy/mm/dd') || '%' and ticket_status = 1 group by substr(ticket_reg,9,3) order by ticket_reg), today as ( select to_char(to_date(#{today},'yyyy/mm/dd')+1, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as today from dual) select a.*, b.today from chart a, today b
